about_the_game: StreamerVille is a place where the only thing that matters is socialization and not gameplay. Compete against your community to stand on stage with your streamer. Practice good teamwork through proximity chat and represent what kind of frog you are. Make the stand for your team and streamer for the whole world to see who really has the best and strongest online community. Meet the viewers you see spamming in chat and hopefully they don't spam you ingame. Come to StreamerVille and get the social life you never had. Frenn
detailed_description: StreamerVille is a place where the only thing that matters is socialization and not gameplay. Compete against your community to stand on stage with your streamer. Practice good teamwork through proximity chat and represent what kind of frog you are. Make the stand for your team and streamer for the whole world to see who really has the best and strongest online community. Meet the viewers you see spamming in chat and hopefully they don't spam you ingame. Come to StreamerVille and get the social life you never had. Frenn

name: StreamerVille

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5800+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 9600 gt
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Asus Xonar D2X 7.1
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Asus Xonar D2X 7.1

short_description: StreamerVille is a Virtual World built for livestreamers to foster fulfilling interactions with their community and seamlessly create juicy content.
